title: Reyhan Harmanci on staying in Europe on the cheap
teaser: Reyhan Harmanci, deputy editor of the food/culture magazine Modern Farmer, tells us about new Euro budget hotels… wherein you might just have to make your own beds…and desks…and showers.
contentencoded: Reyhan Harmanci, deputy editor of the food/culture magazine Modern Farmer, tells us about new Euro budget hotels… wherein you might just have to make your own beds…and desks…and showers.
